mokak harida mokak waradida danne na.karmaya nisa mewa mehema wenawada danne na.api jiwithe api ganna thirana apiwa ekinekata wenas parawal wala aragena yanawa api hithanne wath nathi widiyata.hodatama plan karala ganna thirana kawadawath ee widiyata wenne na.eka parata hithata ena dewal kalama samahara wita hari samahara wita waradi namuth dukak na mokada hithala neme kale kiyala hitha rawatta ganna puluwan nisa.

ithin mamanam kisidaka kiyala na aagamika harayan samachchalayakata lak wena lesa githayaka ho wenayamma nirmanayaka ho bhawitha kalata kamak na kiyana eka.

mamath dakina ekama wiplawa wadiya budun wahanse pamanayi….mokada….api dakina hama wiplawa wadiyama karanne anunta jayaganna para kiyadena eka misak thamanwa jayaganna uthsaha karana eka neweyine…..oba dakina konaya mama danna…mama budun ekama wiplawa wadiya lesa dakinne..ethuman jayagannata wiplawaya kale thamanwama nisayi…..

obata bohoma sthuthiyi ano thumani eya mehi pala kalata!

pasugiya 08 wanida rathriye hadisi kabinat mandala raswimak kandawu janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha, pasku irida (21) praharaya sambandhayen wimarshanaya sandaha pathkara athi parlimenthu wishesha therim karaka sabhawa sambandhayen barapathala wiwechanayak sidukara athi athara thawaduratath ehi katayuthu thama ilakka karagena pawathwa gena giyahoth kabinat mandala raswim walata sahabhagi nowana bawa danum di thibina.

injineru anshaye pudgalayin hata deshiya ha wideshiya patamala hadarime awasthawa salasa di athi athara emagin owunge wruththiimaya ha rajakarimaya katayuthu diyunu karaganima udesa idakada salasa di thibe.mita amatharawa siya danuma pashchath upadhi mattama dakwa wardhanaya karaganimin, nawina thakshanika pragamanayan samaga urenura gati katayuthu kirime awasthawada mema anshaye niladharin ha nawikayin hata salasa di thibe.
hasanka gana mata thibba jelath kiwwada danne na rata otuwa wage.
eekayi parakku wune me paththata enna.)

eeta shri lanka motar ratha ha yathurupadi dhawakayange sangamaye sabhapathi nishan wasalathanthri, shri lanka yuda hamuda komando rejimenthuwe adhipathi brigediyar aar.ee.nugera, siyat shri lanka samagame alewi ha welenda upasabhapathi rawi dadlani, yuda hamuda meheyum adhyaksha brigediyar ech.ech.ee. es.pi. ke. senarathna, yuda hamuda madhya adhyaksha brigediyar ee.em.dab.pi.aar.senewirathna samaga kamando suparkros dhawana pathaye nirmathru hans ralf kapinski mahathwaru athulu yuda hamuda komando rejimenthuwe saha shri lanka motar ratha ha yathurupadi dhawakayange sangamaye niyojithayan rasak ekwi sitiyaha. ← jaya shri maha bodhiye aththak kapu umathu minisage kathawa dumwati nawa mila ganan menna → paralimpik papadi tharagaya atharathura irana kridakayaku maruta

pasugiya wakawanuwe thaman aanduwa paththen kotharam pidanayakata, dadayamakata lak wi sitiyath, janathawa apata laba di athi me wishishta jayagrahanaya ithamathma samakamiwa, sanwarayakin yuthuwa, parajitha parshawawalata agaurawayak sidunowana aakarayata bhukthi widina men shri lanka podujana peramuna yatathe tharanga kala siyaluma parshawa walin mama sahodarathwayen illa sitimi.
